scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && npm ci && npm test
scripts.postversion: npm run version-add-package-files && npm run version-checkout && npm run version-push && npm run version-pull-request
scripts.version-pull-request: gh pr create --fill --base main --head version/$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) | grep -o 'https.*github.*' | xargs gh pr view --web
scripts.release: npm run release-check-merged && npm run release-check-tag-exists && npm run release-push-tags && npm run release-create-draft && npm run release-open-draft
scripts.release-check-merged: git fetch origin && git branch --merged origin/main | grep version/$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) || (echo 'Branch not merged' && exit 1)
scripts.release-check-tag-exists: git fetch --tags && (git ls-remote --tags origin | grep -q $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) && echo 'Tag already exists' && exit 1 || exit 0)
